column3:
Empresses in the Palace—the Legend of Zhen Huan
Adapted from the novel by Liu Lian Zi
column6:
Empresses in the Palace—the Legend of Zhen Huan
Adapted from the novel by Liu Lian Zi

Translators: The Magpie Bridge Brigade 鹊桥小队翻译组
https://magpiebridgebrigade.cn
Twitter/FB/IG @BrigadeMagpie 公众号/微博: 鹊桥小队翻译组
Theme: Unfortunate Love

column3:
Perturbed by the thoughts on my mind
no matter how hard I try to sever my love.
column6:
I can cut a thousand strands of hair
but I cannot sever the tangled threads of my mind.

column3: I could give away my crown for the beauty by my side,
column6:
Bowing with my hands clasped, I give away my throne.
Lowering my head, devoted to the beauty by my side.

column3:
but the wheel of fortune turns weals into woes,
and woes into weals.
column6:
The wheel of fate turns, granting blessings or misfortune.
Will it be destiny’s trial or reward?

column3:
No one is the master of their own destiny,
the vicissitudes throughout their life.
column6:
Heaven’s will cannot be known,
weaving together weals and woes.

column3:
For the lovers of all time,
who can break the spell of romance?
column6:
For lovers caught in eternal time,
who can break the spell of romance?

column3: I could give away my crown for the beauty by my side,
column6:
Bowing with my hands clasped, I give away my throne.
Lowering my head, devoted to the beauty by my side.

column3:
but the wheel of fortune turns weals into woes,
and woes into weals.
column6:
The wheel of fate turns, granting blessings or misfortune.
Will it be destiny’s trial or reward?

column3:
No one is the master of their own destiny,
the vicissitudes throughout their life.
column6:
Heaven’s will cannot be known,
weaving together weals and woes.

column3:
For the lovers of all time,
who can break the spell of romance?
column6:
For lovers caught in eternal time,
who can break the spell of romance?

column3: Who can break the spell of romance?
column6: Who can break the spell of romance?
My Lady, do you really trust Consort Honnête?

column3: 用人不疑 疑人不用
column6: "Only use those you trust, never the ones you suspect."
His Majesty the Emperor.
Peace and grace to Your Majesty.

- Rise.
- I thank Your Majesty.

column3: 皇上怎么这个时候过来
column6: What brings Your Majesty here at this time?
Your Majesty surprises me.
"By the little carved window, she was combing and adorning herself."

column3: 原来是这样安静融洽的光景
column6: Now I know what a peaceful and harmonious sight that is.
Why are you combing your hair at this time?

column3: 皇上方才进来时仿佛很高兴
column6: Your Majesty seemed very happy when you came in.

column3: 有什么高兴事也告诉臣妾
column6:
Will Your Majesty tell me the happy news
so I can share the feeling with you?

column3: 也好叫臣妾一同乐一乐

column6: Huan Huan, your senses are as refined as your hair.

column3: 早朝的时候大臣们上了奏章
column6: In court this morning,
officials reported a surplus in revenue and food supplies for this year.
The people can live a happy and stable life now.
I am very happy to hear that.
I also visited Consort Honnête yesterday night.
Consort Honnête is typically taciturn,

column3: 偶尔说起几句倒是很入情入理
column6: but she is quite reasonable when she does voice her opinion.

column3: 端妃娘娘久在宫中见识深远
column6:
Consort Honnête is wise and knowledgeable
because of her long residency in the palace.

And Your Majesty has always been benevolent to all,
making wise decisions on both household and external affairs.

column3: 对内对外都是英明睿智

column6: That's why the country enjoys prosperity and stability today.
As I witness the stability in the court,

column3: 遥想当年纯元皇后为福晋
column6:
I try to picture when Empress Première
was leading your lord concubines.

column3: 若是今日纯元皇后还在
column6: If Empress Première was still with us today,
I believe the ambiance of the harem would be much different.
You've heard accounts of Empress Première?
Jinxi entered the palace early.

She often told me how Empress Première
bestowed grace upon all the servants.
Although this may sound presumptuous,

column3: 若是今日纯元皇后还在
column6: if Empress Première was still alive,

how would Her Majesty resolve the affair
between Jinxi and Su Peisheng?
If Empress Première was still alive...

column3: 当今皇后是纯元皇后的亲妹妹
column6: The Empress is the younger sister of Empress Première.

column3: 彼此性情自然是一路的
column6: I assume Their Majesties shared the same disposition.

column3: 要以槿汐与苏培盛之事惩戒后宫
column6:
Although Her Majesty intends to use this incident
as a warning to the harem,
I suppose...

column3: 大约也不会真要了他们的性命吧
column6: Her Majesty will not actually take their lives.
Especially given Your Majesty's benevolence,
I'm sure Her Majesty

column3: 绝不会与皇上言行相悖
更不会与纯元皇后相悖
column6:
will not act in contradiction to Your Majesty
and Empress Première's inclinations.

column3: 宜修如何能与纯元相提并论
column6: How can Yixiu compare to Empress Première?

column3: 朕想着你怀着双生胎辛苦
column6: I have been thinking it must be exhausting for you to carry twins.

column3: 你腹中之子并非朕的孩子
column6: Yet, the palace is filled with rumors that you are not carrying my children.
I don't mind what others say,

column3: 竟然连皇后也要朕留心
column6: but even the Empress has also mentioned it.
Her Majesty is justly concerned about the affairs of the harem.
Consort Honnête was correct.

column3: 宫中现在有两位嫔妃有孕
column6: With two concubines pregnant,

column3: 哪里能见得这样生死打杀的东西
column6: the palace shouldn't see any bloodshed.
Even if they should be punished, it should be postponed.
Earlier, Your Majesty asked My Lady why she was combing her hair at this time.
There is a reason for it.

column3: 槿汐出事小主又气又伤心
column6: Jinxi's situation has upset and saddened My Lady.

column3: 已经有两天没有睡好觉了
column6: It's been two days since My Lady got a decent night's sleep.

column3: 说用篦子梳梳头可以松缓精神
column6:
Dr. Wen suggested combing the hair
can help calm anxiety and improve sleep.
Quiet.

column3: 谁让你在皇上面前嚼舌根的
column6: Who gave you permission to "chew your tongue" before His Majesty?
Your Majesty, don't listen to Jade.
I have been sleeping very well.
You still want to deceive me?
I can tell you haven't slept well by the dark circles under your eyes.

column3: 嬛嬛 你一味委曲求全
column6: Huan Huan, you always make compromises

column3: 还要拦着浣碧不许说实话
column6: and even forbid Jade from telling the truth.

column3: 臣妾能再度侍奉皇上身边
column6: It's already a blessing for me to serve Your Majesty again.
It's of no concern that sometimes I need to make compromises.

column3: 只是槿汐她陪在臣妾身边多年
column6: But I just can't bear to see Jinxi suffer

column3: 臣妾心里总会有些舍不得
column6: as she has been by my side all these years.

column3: 这说到底总是槿汐的不是
column6: However, I understand Jinxi is at fault here.
Her Majesty is the head of the harem.

column3: 她若真想要以宫规处置
column6: If she wants to punish Jinxi by the palace rules,

column3: 臣妾也奈何不了只得听从
column6: there is nothing I can do but obey.
Though the Empress is in charge of the harem,

column3: 难不成朕就不许过问了吗
column6: I can always step in.

column3: 皇上切勿因此迁怒了皇后娘娘
column6: Your Majesty must not vent anger on Her Majesty over this.
I am the only one to blame.
I failed to properly instruct my servant.

column3: 这样的事朝朝代代都有
column6: This kind of thing has happened in every dynasty.

Ever since "heaven and earth were separated,"
these relationships have existed.

column3: 论起来他们都是饮食男女
column6: They are just normal men and women with human desires.
Though eunuchs don't count as men,
they still have human affection.
I shouldn't try to extinguish their human desires.

column3: 说起来总是宫墙之内的事
column6: This incident, after all, happened within these palace walls.
It's better to solve it quietly.

column3: 若是大肆张扬到了臣民耳中
column6: If we let this draw too much attention from the citizenry,
it will only give rise to ridicule.

column3: 且苏培盛是自小服侍皇上的人
column6: Besides, Su Peisheng has been serving Your Majesty since your childhood.
He has spent more days and nights by Your Majesty's side

column3: 只怕比臣妾还多上许多
column6: than I have.
His hard work should offset one mistake.
"Spent more days and nights by my side"?

column3: 这话听起来倒像是吃醋一般
column6: It sounds like you are jealous of him.

column3: 真真是唯女子与小人难养也
column6: It's true that "Only women and small men are hard to deal with."
I am a woman,
with small men in my belly.
If Your Majesty thinks we are hard to deal with,
then just leave us alone.
How can I bear to do that?
Jinxi!
Your Highness!
Your Highness...

- It's good that you're back.
- How is Your Highness?

column3: 回来就好 回来就好啊
column6: Good, good to see you back.
Your Highness, please forgive me.
Rise, quickly!
His Majesty said that

column3: 只罚一年的月钱算是惩罚
column6: your punishment is just one year's stipend.
As long as you're fine, nothing else matters.

column3: 谢娘娘恩德 谢皇上恩德
column6: I'm thankful for Your Highness and His Majesty's grace.

column3: 你扶槿汐回屋子里去歇息吧
column6: Go with Jinxi and help her get some rest.

column3: 这两日就不用过来伺候了
column6: You don't need to serve me these two days.

column3: 奴婢没事 苏培盛呢
column6: I'm all right, Your Highness.
How is Su Peisheng?

column3: 都好已经回养心殿去伺候了
column6: All is well. He's already back to work at the Hall of Mental Cultivation.
Go have some rest.
I thank Your Highness.

column3: 浣碧 扶槿汐进去休息
column6: Jade, help Jinxi get rested.
Let's go.

column3: 奴才苏培盛给皇上请安
column6: Su Peisheng... bows before Your Majesty.
Peace and grace to Your Majesty.
You are back.
I thank Your Majesty.

column3: 粉身碎骨难报皇上大恩
column6: Even sacrificing my life would not repay Your Majesty's grace.
Good to have you back. Now grind ink.
Yes.
Your Majesty, please have some cloud ear soup first.
I will prepare your ink right away.
I know what you want to ask.

column3: 永寿宫没事崔槿汐也没事
column6: The Palace of Eternal Longevity and Cui Jinxi are both fine.

column3: 朕罚了你们一年的月银
column6: I punished you both with a fine of one year's stipend.
A small punishment to prevent you from making a bigger mistake.
I have to take the Empress's opinion into account

column3: 朕不能不顾及皇后的道理
column6: on this kind of inappropriate matter.
I need to demonstrate my stance.
Your Majesty, I understand.

column3: 这样的事也不早让朕知道
column6: You should have told me earlier.

column3: 奴才是怕这样的事说出来
column6: I'm afraid that this kind of matter
would soil Your Majesty's ears.
Forget it. Don't stay in personal contact with her anymore.
In case there are gossips again.
Your Majesty,

column3: 皇上奴才和槿汐老早就相识
column6: Jinxi and I have known each other for a long time
and we're from the same hometown.
I'm getting old.

column3: 挨了一刀的家伙没儿没女的
column6: I've taken the cut and will never have children.
I deserve no one by my death bed.

column3: 奴才只想和槿汐就个伴
column6: I just want to...
have Jinxi's company.
Your Majesty...
I'm sincere.
All right.
Forget what I said just now.
Nor did I hear what you said.
Have it your own way.

column3: 奴才谢皇上大恩 谢皇上
column6: I thank Your Majesty for the great grace.
I thank Your Majesty.
Peace to My Ladies.
Her Majesty just got up.

column3: 请各位小主稍后来请安
column6: Please come back later to pay your respects.

column3: 娘娘这里的菊花开得正好
column6: The chrysanthemums here are in full bloom.
We'll enjoy the flowers in the courtyard
so that Her Majesty can take her time.
As you please, My Ladies.
What you said is so true.
Like master, like servant.
The whole thing caused an uproar.

column3: 我看熹妃如何收回这个脸面
column6: I want to see how Consort Lumiere can save face.

column3: 还如何收拾得起脸面哪
column6: How can she save face?
She won't find it anywhere in the harem!

column3: 我要是她就主仆俩一起躲起来
column6:
If I were her, my servant and I would hide together
and never leave the Palace of Eternal Longevity.
Cui Jinxi is her trusted subordinate.

column3: 保不定这东西是她自己
column6: Perhaps she needed that sachet to seduce His Majesty.

column3: 只不过是底下人替她保管着罢了
column6: She just had the servant keep it for her.
Peace to Your Highness Consort Lumiere.

column3: 还未恭喜祺贵人终于放出来了
column6:
I haven't gotten a chance to congratulate you, Lady Delice -
you are finally released from confinement.

column3: 想必祺贵人禁足时一定是闷坏了
column6: You must've been extremely bored when confined.
Jumping into the crowd the minute you're released.

column3: 谁是谁非娘娘心里明镜似的
column6: Your Highness has eyes like mirrors to see what's right and wrong.

column3: 何必指鹿为马颠倒黑白呢
column6: No need to "call a stag a horse" or "describe black as white".
Her Majesty made the request to His Majesty for you to be released

column3: 特地求了皇上把祺贵人放出来
column6: so we can reunite for the Mid-Autumn Festival.
I thought you learned your lesson,
but you're still so quick to lose your temper.
What a terrible waste of Her Majesty's good intentions!
It's my own mistake if I did something wrong,
which is nothing compared to Your Highness's servant,

column3: 做出这等没脸面的事来
column6: who did such a shameless thing.

column3: 可不知是不是上梁不正下梁歪啊
column6: I wonder if it's "because the top beam is crooked, the entire house is twisted."

column3: 奴婢前两日病着不能起身
column6: For the past few days, I've been sick and unable to get up.

column3: 如今既好了便赶来服侍娘娘了
column6: Now that I am better, I came to serve Your Highness.
Allow me.
Jade, you should have carried a cape for Her Highness on such a cold morning.

column3: 怎么不知道给娘娘带个披肩呢
万一真冻病了皇上又要心疼了
column6: His Majesty will worry if Her Highness gets sick.

column3: 方才的话是该对熹妃娘娘说的吗
column6:
Lady Délice, as a concubine, is it appropriate for you
to speak to Her Highness Consort Lumière in this way?
You say "The top beam is crooked, so the entire house is twisted".

column3: 那么熹妃娘娘身为妃位
column6: But Consort Lumière ranks as Consort while you're just a Noble Lady -
at least you should know the difference between superiors and inferiors.

column3: 再说了小主当日苛待宫人
column6: Moreover, when you mistreated your residents the other day,
do you also blame "an upper beam that was crooked"?

column3: 小主也未免有些太强词夺理了
column6: You can twist your words but they won't be the truth.

column3: 强词夺理的是你崔槿汐
column6: You are the one twisting the words, Cui Jinxi!
You are the one who desecrated the harem!
Yes, I'm on good terms with Su Peisheng.
Well, what of it?
Even if you don't like it,

column3: 恕奴婢出慎刑司的人是皇上
column6: it was His Majesty who released me.
Therefore, I do not deserve the accusation of "desecrating the harem".

column3: 小主若硬说奴婢是秽乱宫闱
column6: If you insist on this,

column3: 那岂不是暗指皇上包庇了奴婢
column6: are you implying that His Majesty sheltered me
and allowed me to create disorder in the palace?
So what do you all think?
Do you share the same mind as Lady Délice?
We dare not, Your Highness.
Her Majesty is ready.
My Ladies, please come in.
Ah, Jinxi is here.
Yes, Your Majesty.

column3: 伺候熹妃娘娘是奴婢的本分
column6: It's my duty to serve Consort Lumiere.

column3: 槿汐呀你可是宫中的老人儿了
column6: Jinxi, you're senior in the palace.

column3: 以后服侍着熹妃应该格外上心
column6: You should serve Consort Lumiere with extra care.
Don't cause any more trouble and upset her.
Yes. I thank Your Majesty for your guidance.
The Mid-Autumn Festival is approaching.

column3: 听闻果郡王很快就会回京了
column6: Noble Prince Guo is coming back to the capital.
Besides, Consort Lumiere will deliver her child soon,
and Concubine Vertu is pregnant.

column3: 皇上的意思是要好好操办
column6: His Majesty wants a proper celebration.
We will be delighted to follow your arrangement.

column3: 奴才苏培盛给娘娘请安
column6: Su Peisheng bows before Your Highness.
You're here.

column3: 皇上让奴才送一品红枣雪蛤来
column6:
His Majesty asked me to bring a serving of
red dates and hasma to nourish Your Highness's health.
I thank His Majesty.
Thank you too, sir.
Jade, grant Mr. Su a seat.
I thank Your Highness.

column3: 数日不见公公清减了不少
column6:
I haven't seen you for a few days, sir.
You have slimmed down a lot.

column3: 自个儿的身子还挺强健的呢
column6: I thought I was pretty strong and healthy.

column3: 没想到只到慎刑司数日
column6: I didn't expect to become feeble like this
after several days of hard labor work in the Department of Penalty.
I'm indeed old and useless.

column3: 奴才如今还是回到皇上的身边
column6: Since I'm still serving His Majesty, no one dares gossip.

column3: 倒也不敢有人说三道四的
column6: But ...
How are things with Jinxi?
I'm sure your heart can see it, sir,

column3: 也是因为她在本宫身边的缘故
column6:
the reason so many people gossip about Jinxi
is that she works for me.

column3: 此次的事虽说是公公一不小心
掉出了那枚缨络才闹出的事端
column6: The incident was only because you accidentally dropped the sachet.

column3: 本宫一力想保住你们二人
column6: I endeavored to protect the two of you and I was at my wits' end.
Fortunately, His Majesty took into account your past service.
Yes.
I was careless.

column3: 没想到就连带皇后娘娘也上了心
column6: I didn't expect that even Her Majesty the Empress would become involved.
I'll keep this lesson in mind.

column3: 这个教训不仅公公要谨记

column6:
This is not only a lesson for you, sir;
it is now in my memory as well.
Yes.
So Jinxi...?
You can rest assured.

column3: 奴才没有什么不放心的
column6: I absolutely can, having heard Your Highness say so.
Allow me to take my leave.
Certainly.
No, you shouldn't have.

column3: 我自个儿来 自个儿来
column6: Let me do it myself. Let me do it.
Just sit.
You don't see your clothes have worn out.

column3: 到了御前不怕被皇上训斥啊
column6: Aren't you afraid of being scolded by His Majesty?
I know you're versatile,

column3: 只是也保不齐样样都忙得过来啊
column6: but ...you can't attend to everything.
Are you all right?
I'm good; I'm really good.

column3: 别人越说我不好我越要过得好
column6:
The more miserable they think I am,
the more committed I am to living well.
I live for myself.
Am I going to hang myself to fulfill their wish?
You are right.
However, I know

column3: 你当初是为了熹妃娘娘的事
column6: you came to me back then
because you had to help Consort Lumière.

column3: 你若不是心甘情愿的话
column6: If your heart hasn't been committed,

column3: 外头流言传得这么难听
column6: the rumors now must be hard to bear,

column3: 不如咱们断了不要勉强
column6:
we can end this now,
so you don't need to put up with all this.
What are you talking about?

column3: 我们在一起不就是为了做个伴吗
column6: We are together because we need a partner in our lives.
Besides Consort Lumière,

column3: 和我相关的就只有你一个了
column6: you are the only person connected to me.

column3: 在慎刑司那两天我也算想明白了
column6: During my days in the Department of Penalty, I also realized

column3: 而伤害一个真正爱护自己的人
column6: it would be the most foolish and unworthy thing to do -

column3: 才是最大的愚蠢和不值
column6:
to hurt a person who truly cares about me -
over a few rumors.

Translators: The Magpie Bridge Brigade 鹊桥小队翻译组
Follow us to get updates on the translation progress.
Twitter/FB/IG @BrigadeMagpie 公众号/微博: 鹊桥小队翻译组
It's a big day for you, My Lady.
Why not wear something red to look festive?

column3: 像乡下媒婆涂红脸的腮帮子
column6: It looks like the red cheeks of a country matchmaker.

column3: 去给我换一件绿颜色的来
column6: Bring me something green.

column3: 小主天天不是穿绿色的
column6: My Lady, you wear green
or light blue every day.
Why don't you wear a different color today?
I said green, and I mean green.
If you insist on being festive,

column3: 就给我换那个绿色绣合欢花的吧
column6: then bring me that dress with the "coupling joy" flowers embroidered.
Yes.
My Lady.
You look good.

column3: 晚上重华宫中秋夜宴你陪我去
column6:
You will accompany me to the Mid-Autumn banquet
at the Palace of Layered Brilliance.

column3: 奴婢这样打扮只是不想太丑
column6: I just don't want to look too ugly.

column3: 并没有抢小主风头的意思
column6: I have no intention of stealing the glory from Your Highness.

column3: 能在打扮得好看的年纪好好打扮
column6: You're at an age when you should dress up to look good.
There is nothing wrong with that.

column3: 奴婢并不是要打扮给王爷看的
column6: I'm not dressing up for His Lordship.

column3: 要是小主打扮起来会更加好看
column6:
My Lady, you could look even more beautiful
if you want to make an effort.
I only feel ashamed in front of him.
If I were to dress up,
it would be only for His Majesty.
His Majesty the Emperor!
Peace and grace to Your Majesty.
All sit.
Take your seat.

column3: 手这样凉 可是着了风寒了
column6: Your hands are freezing, did you catch a cold?

column3: 最近夜里是觉得风凉了
column6: Recently, it has been windy and cold at night.
Where is Yunli?
I'm late, Your Majesty.
I beg Your Majesty’s pardon for my delay.

column3: 朕早就习惯你在宴席上迟到早退
column6: I'm already used to your late arrivals and early departures.
You insisted on going to Shengjing back then.

column3: 如今人都添了几分憔悴
column6: You look a little haggard right now.

column3: 到了盛京不幸染了风寒
column6: Unfortunately, I caught a cold when I arrived in Shengjing.
I was sick for over ten days.
It was not due to traveling.
Why did no one tell me you were sick?

column3: 身边跟着的人都是做什么的
column6: What exactly were those servants doing?
I didn't let them say anything.

column3: 都是小病而已如今都好了
column6:
It was just an insignificant ailment.
I'm fully recovered now.

column3: 你是缺个照顾你起居的人了
column6: You need a person who can take care of you in your everyday life.
Do you have anyone in mind right now?
I wouldn't be coming alone

column3: 臣弟也不会只身前来了
column6: if I had one.

column3: 也许臣弟毕生所求都只是
column6: Maybe all I want in my life is
"Zhuangzi's dream to become a butterfly."

column3: 其实允禧啊也长大很多了
column6: Speaking of which, Yunxi is of age as well.

column3: 也该找个福晋好好静静心了
column6: It is also time to search for a wife and settle down.
Please don't tease me, imperial sister-in-law.

column3: 臣弟和十七哥心思一样
column6: I share my 17th brother's desire

column3: 必要求一位心爱之人才好
column6: that I have to find someone that I love.

column3: 你看大的不好教坏小的
column6: Look, the older one doesn't set a good example.
Now Yunxi doesn't want to marry.

column3: 大清只要有皇兄枝繁叶茂就好
column6:
The Great Qing needs only our imperial brother
to "spread out the branches" for our family.
So we have more time doing nothing.
Peace to Concubine Vertu.
I haven't said congratulations to Your Highness.
I thank Your Lordship.
Peace to Consort Lumière.
The same to you Your Lordship.

column3: 娘娘即将临盆 身体可还康泰
column6:
Your Highness's due date is near.
How's your health?

I thank Your Lordship for caring.
Everything is going well.

column3: 皇上 小主该去喝安胎药了
column6: Your Majesty, it's time for My Lady to take her prenatal tonic.
Go quickly.
I'll be back soon, Your Majesty.

column3: 但愿人长久 千里共婵娟
column6:
"I pray our life be long;
A thousand miles apart, we can still share the beauty of the full moon."
[Poem from Sushi, Song Dynasty]
My Lady, are you all right?
I thought I could hold it in.
I thought I could forget about him.
I almost couldn't behave properly.
I fully understand the bitterness in the hearts of
His Lordship and you, My lady. It's just...
He must live a good life.
Your emotions are disturbed.

column3: 我们还是缓一缓再回去吧
column6: Let's take time to soothe your feelings.
I will accompany you for a walk.
How have you been?
I already said earlier at the banquet
that everything is fine.

column3: 方才是方才现在是现在
column6: That was then. Now is now.
I stayed in Shengjing for several months.
Now I'm back,

column3: 只想听娘娘真心说自己安好
column6: I need to hear Your Highness say you're fine from your heart,
so that I can put my mind at ease.

column3: 王爷若关心太多本宫是否安好
column6: If Your Lordship cares too much about my well-being,
Your Lordship will be ill at ease.
Please don't exert your mind.
Jade, let's go back.
Don't leave.
Let me go.
Let me go.
Let go.

column3: 我总觉得你的日子过得不舒心
column6: I always think you're not truly happy,

column3: 即便听闻永寿宫焕然如金屋
column6:
even with the Palace of Eternal Longevity
being as opulent as a golden house.

column3: 无论住的是金屋还是茅屋
column6: Whether it's house made of gold or of hay,
I chose to live in it myself.
Whether one can live comfortably depends entirely on oneself,
and not anyone else.
Even Noble Lady Paix,
despite her humble status back then,

column3: 可也比如今自由自在多了
column6: was much more free.
Isn't it even more true for you...
You're not her.

column3: 又怎知她不是自得其乐
column6: How do you know whether she's happy?
It's not only the person themselves
that can tell if they're happy.

column3: 月有阴晴圆缺何况人生百变呢
column6: The moon waxes and wanes, and so does life.
Your Lordship,

column3: 不要再为不值得伤心的人伤心了
column6: please don't be sad about people who are not worthy.
If we...

column3: 做人如果不能由着自己的心的话
column6: cannot live our life following our hearts,
we are more pathetic than the moon.

column3: 到了十五总还能圆一回
column6: At least the moon reaches fullness every fifteenth.

column3: 所以来世我不会再选择那么艰苦
column6: So I won't choose this hardship in the next life.

column3: 王爷与本宫再耽搁下去
column6: If Your Lordship and I delay any longer,
His Majesty will be alerted.
Please take good care of yourself.
You too.

column3: 为了避嫌还是我先回去
column6: To avoid suspicion, I'll go back first.

column3: 过了片刻你再入席就是了
column6: You can go in a while later.
Who's there?
What's the matter, Jade?

column3: 奴婢方才见有人影闪过
column6: I just saw a silhouette passing by.
Let's go back now.
The Imperial Garden is nearby.
It's nice in the daytime,

column3: 可是到夜里觉得阴森森的
column6: but it feels spooky at night.
We pass by every day.
What's there to be afraid of?
Where did all those cats come from?
Protect Her Highness!

column3: 有猫 快走快走 快走
column6: Cats... Go quickly.
Go quickly!
Go quickly!
My Lady! Are you all right?
My Lady!

column3: 娘娘 娘娘 娘娘
column6: Your Highness, Your Highness!
It hurts... It hurts!
What do we do?

column3: 用点力 娘娘 使劲啊
column6: Push harder, Your Highness.
Push Harder!
Push Harder, Your Highness!
Try harder, Your Highness!

column3: 再用力 用点力 娘娘
column6: Push harder, Your Highness!

column3: 娘娘 使劲啊 使劲啊
column6: Your Highness, try harder!

column3: 怎么样啊 娘娘 生了没有
column6:
How is Her Highness?
Is the baby out?

column3: 怎么办呀 怎么办呀
column6: What do we do?

column3: 娘娘 使劲啊 娘娘 用力
column6: Your Highness, push harder!
Go check if the labor tonic is ready.
Remember, for Her Highness to take it,
the tonic has to be brewed thick.
Yes!

column3: 娘娘皇上已经得了消息
column6: Your Highness, His Majesty has been informed.
He will soon be here.

column3: 有句话微臣不得不问娘娘
column6: I have to ask, Your Highness.
If by any chance something goes wrong,

column3: 娘娘是自保还是保胎儿啊
column6: do we protect Your Highness or the children?

column3: 温实初以我们数十年的情分
column6: Wen Shichu, swear on our decades of friendship...
You have to promise me...
Whatever happens,

column3: 你都不能伤害我的孩子
column6: You cannot hurt my children!
Do you hear me?!
I knew Your Highness would say this,
but I still had to ask.
Remember,

column3: 保得住我们母子三人最好
column6: it's best if you can keep us all safe.
If not,

column3: 若保不住 你必须舍母保子
column6: you have to...
save the children!
Remember?!

column3: 否则你即便让我留了下来
column6: Otherwise, even if I get to live,
I'll do something much worse
than committing suicide!
I've said it and I mean it.
Do you hear me?!

column3: 娘娘还说这种没轻没重的话
column6:
How can Your Highness say something
so senseless at this time?
Your Highness, His Majesty is here.
Go...
Go request of His Majesty,
If something unforeseen happens,

column3: 请皇上不要顾及多年情分
column6: please forget our years of affection ...
Don't hesitate in the slightest
to give me up for the children's sake.
Your Highness!
My Lady, at this critical moment,
how can you ask Jinxi to say such inauspicious words to His Majesty?
Push, Your Highness.
Your Highness, push!
Nonsense!

column3: 熹妃母子都要平安无恙
column6: I have said that both Consort Lumière and the children must be safe.

column3: 否则要太医院一同陪葬
column6: Otherwise, the whole Imperial Infirmary will be buried alongside them.

column3: 上天对朕的惩罚已经够多了
column6: I've received too much punishment from Heaven.

column3: 朕的孩子不能再出事绝对不能
column6: My children must be safe this time! Must be!
My Lady is awake!
My children... Where are my children?

column3: 娘娘 被乳母抱去喂奶了
column6: Your Highness, the nursemaids are feeding them now.
They'll be back soon.
It's a boy and a girl.

column3: 嬛嬛 你给了朕一对龙凤呈祥
column6: Huan Huan, you brought me a dragon and a phoenix.
Has Meizhuang been here?

column3: 还有温大人怎么也不在了
column6: And where's Dr. Wen?
Concubine Vertu is pregnant, so I let her go back to rest.
Dr. Wen is still here.

column3: 在后头亲自看人煎药呢
column6: He's supervising the servants brewing the tonic.
Your Majesty, Your Highness,

column3: 奴婢听闻龙凤胎是龙凤呈祥
column6:
I heard that a “dragon and phoenix pair”
is an auspice of prosperity and peace.

column3: 奴婢们恭喜皇上恭喜娘娘
column6:
We congratulate Your Majesty!
Congratulations to Your Highness!
Well said!

column3: 永寿宫上下各赏半年的月例
column6: I reward everyone in the Palace of Eternal Longevity with half a year's stipend,
for your tireless dedication to your master.
I thank Your Majesty.

column3: 奴婢给皇上道喜 给娘娘道喜
column6:
Congratulations to Your Majesty.
Congratulations to Your Highness.
Madam, you are here.

The Empress Dowager is overjoyed to hear that
Your Highness gave birth to the twins safely.
So she sent me to deliver her greetings.

column3: 还请姑姑代本宫多谢太后
column6: Please thank Her Majesty for me, madam.

column3: 奴婢也不知道能不能有这个福气

column6:
I wonder if I could be so fortunate to be the first person
to "win the top prize" of seeing the prince and the princess.

column3: 先瞧瞧小阿哥和小公主

column6: So I can report to Her Majesty later.

column3: 槿汐快去把孩子抱来是
column6: Jinxi, bring the children here quickly.

column3: 太后知道了一定会很高兴
column6: Her Majesty will be elated.
It would also benefit her health.

column3: 说来臣妾也还没见过呢
column6: In fact, even I haven't seen them yet.
Your Highness.

column3: 向皇上和熹妃娘娘请安
column6: The princess and the prince bid peace to Your Majesty and Your Highness.

column3: 阿哥的额头和下巴像嬛嬛
column6: The prince has your forehead and chin.

column3: 公主的眉眼与嬛嬛相似
column6: The princess has your brows and eyes.
They are babies,

column3: 哪看得出什么地方像臣妾
column6: how can one tell any resemblance?
Your Majesty is just saying that to make me happy.
The more a father looks at his children, the more he adores them.
Huan Huan, thank you.
Your Majesty, the babies are too little.
Let's have the nursemaids take them back.
Yes, yes, go ahead.
Now I've seen the twins, I can report back to Her Majesty.
Very well.
I shall take my leave.
Yes.

column3: 嬛嬛你知道朕有多高兴吗
column6: Huan Huan, do you know how happy I am?

column3: 你一下子给朕生了两个孩子
column6: You gave birth to two children at once. It is a huge contribution.
I will promote you to Noble Consort.

column3: 要让你做朕最钟爱的贵妃
column6: You will be my beloved Noble Consort.

column3: 皇上若要给臣妾贵妃的名位
column6: Your Majesty, I do not deserve the title of Noble Consort.

column3: 没有人能担得起贵妃的名位
column6: Besides you, no one else deserves this title in my mind.

column3: 好好的怎么打冷战了可是冷了
column6: You just shuddered. Do you feel cold?

column3: 斐雯娘娘刚生完怎么可以开窗
column6: Petunia, why did you leave the door open?

column3: 万一冻着怎么办快关上
column6: Her Highness could catch a cold. Close it immediately!
Your Majesty,

column3: 方才接生嬷嬷说殿里血腥气重
column6:
the birthing madam said that there was a strong smell
of blood in the hall, and told me to keep the door open.
So I didn't close it.
You make excuses for exposing Her Highness to cold?
Slap her twenty times outside.
Yes.
Su Peisheng.
Yes, Your Majesty.
Deliver my decree to the whole harem:

Consort Lumière of the Palace of Eternal Longevity
is promoted to Noble Consort Lumière.

column3: 于皇子满月之日同册嘉礼
column6: The formal ceremony will be held on the day when the twins turn one month old.

column3: 熹贵妃出月后赐协理六宫之权
column6:
Noble Consort Lumière will be entrusted with the authority
to assist in palace affairs after sitting the month.
Yes, Your Majesty.
Huan Huan, do you like it?

column3: 皇上赏赐 臣妾自然喜不自胜
column6: I rejoice at Your Majesty's reward.
His Majesty is listening inside.
I'll let you slap yourself.
My hand might be too heavy.

column3: 这件事情真的不关奴婢的事
column6: Mr. Yun, you heard that it was not my fault.
I was just following the instructions.

column3: 皇上爱惜娘娘一时拿你撒气
column6: His Majesty took it out on you because he cherishes Her Highness.
Don't hold any grudge.

column3: 就要拿咱们做奴才的撒气吗
column6:
Why does His Majesty take it out on us servants
just because he cherishes Her Highness?
Mind your tongue!

column3: 让皇上听见可就不止掌嘴了
column6: It won't just be slapping yourself if His Majesty hears that.

column3: 娘娘 奴才斗胆向娘娘讨个赏
column6: Your Highness, I boldly request a reward.
Your Highness is favored by His Majesty and blessed by Heaven.

column3: 也好让奴才沾点喜气啊
column6: Any reward from Your Highness will bring me good luck.
You deserve a big reward.

column3: 还得皇上来给才体面呀
column6: It would be more appropriate if it's from His Majesty.

column3: 从前你们俩受了极大的委屈
column6: You two endured great hardship in the past.
Since the Noble Consort requested,

column3: 朕就把槿汐正式赐给你做妻子
column6: I'll grant Jinxi to be your official wife.
Treat her well.
Yes!
I thank Your Majesty.

column3: 多谢皇上 娘娘厚爱
column6: I thank Your Majesty and Your Highness for the good graces.
I will,
I... I will treat Jinxi well!
What are you all waiting for?

column3: 多谢皇上 多谢娘娘

column6:
- I thank Your Majesty and Your Highness!
- Go ask for drinks from them.
Your Highness!
Have a good rest.
I'll come back to see you tonight.
I bid Your Majesty goodbye.
I bid Your Majesty goodbye.

column3: 方才敬妃娘娘过来看过
column6: Consort Estime was here earlier.
Will you see her, My Lady?
I feel tired now.

column3: 你去回敬妃的话谢她的盛情

column6:
Thank Consort Estime for me, and tell her
that I will invite her over after I recover.
Reply to her with what I said.
I won't see any visitors for now.
Yes.

column3: 一个小公主 一个小阿哥
column6: The little princess and the little prince are identically adorable.

column3: 太后高兴得都看不过来了
column6: Your Majesty is too joyful to take your eyes off the babies.
What a joyous occasion!

column3: 就算眼睛看花了也是高兴
column6: I would keep looking at them until my eyes get sore.

column3: 抱远一点 别沾了哀家的病气
column6: Keep them farther from me, so that I won't pass my weak qi to them.

column3: 熹贵妃的龙凤胎是早产的
column6: Noble Consort Lumière's twins were born prematurely.
You must take good care of them.
No mistake will be pardoned.
Yes.
Have you decided on their names?
The Sixth Prince is named Hongyan.
Let me look at the Sixth Prince.
Good boy.
Unlike you, he has fair and tender skin.

column3: 不像皇帝生下来黑黯黯的
column6: You had dark skin when you were born.

column3: 所以生下来的孩子自然白嫩
column6: Noble Consort Lumière has fair skin, and so do the twins.
The princess's honorary name hasn't been determined yet.
I'll leave that up to Noble Consort Lumière.
Good. You name the prince and she names the princess.

column3: 就等惠嫔的孩子生下来
column6: I will name the child of Concubine Vertu once it's born.

column3: 臣妾的清白也可分明了
column6:
Now that the twins have "landed on the ground",
I can finally be vindicated from the rumor.

column3: 外头再有什么流言辈语
column6: I will impose stern punishment on whoever spreads any rumors.

column3: 臣妾能再陪伴四郎左右
诞下孩儿已是上天庇佑
column6:
I'm blessed by Heaven to come back to Si Lang's side
and give birth to our children.
There's nothing for me to complain about.

column3: 别人却怀疑你腹中的孩儿
column6:
While you were cautious of your words and actions,
others suspected the children in your belly.

column3: 终究朕是要理一理后宫的舌头
column6: I must "straighten the tongues" in the harem.

column3: 也不过是女人之间的事情
column6: Harem affairs are just the concerns of women.
Her Majesty will exercise good judgment.

column3: 皇上又何必要镗这趟浑水
column6: Why would Your Majesty wade into the muddy water?

column3: 反叫人落了偏心臣妾的口实
column6: Others might affirm their belief that Your Majesty is partial towards me.
I am showing my partiality towards you to the whole harem.

column3: 这样她们就不敢再轻视你半分
column6: Then they will never dare to slight you at all.

column3: 皇后从前也是担得起贤德二字的
column6: The Empress used to uphold a virtuous name.
But now her "ears have grown soft",

column3: 不知是否是岁数大了的缘故
column6: which might be due to her age.

column3: 至近至远东西 至深至浅清溪
column6:
"East and West are the nearest and the furthest apart;
A clear stream can be deep but look shallow."

column3: 至高至明日月 至亲至疏夫妻
column6:
"The sun and the moon are the highest and brightest;
Husband and wife can be closest and most distant."

column3: 只要四郎时刻相信嬛嬛
column6: As long as Si Lang has faith in me,

column3: 那咱们就是至亲夫妻了
column6: we will be "the closest husband and wife".
Her Majesty the Empress!
Peace to Your Majesty.
Have a seat.
Yes.

column3: 嫔妾失礼 还请娘娘恕罪
column6: I hope Your Majesty forgives my bad manners.
Just stay there.

column3: 我们大清的有功之人哪
column6: You have borne a great accomplishment for the entire nation.
I thank Your Majesty.

column3: 熹贵妃诞下这两个婴孩之后
臣妾也没有旁的东西可以赠送
column6:
Noble Consort Lumière has given birth to two children.
I have no other gifts than these:

column3: 有几块上好的羊脂玉给了臣妾
column6:
My sister gave me several pieces of precious
suet-white jade a long time ago.

column3: 臣妾已叫工匠连夜赶工
column6: I urged the craftsmen to work hard overnight
to carve them into a pair of jade bi for the babies as their amulets.

column3: 她的东西自然是极好的
column6: Her things are naturally the finest,
and suitable for the babies.
I appreciate your generosity.

column3: 留给臣妾的念想之物不少
column6: My sister left me many items to remember her with.

column3: 臣妾都时不时拿出细看一番
column6:
I take them out and look at them sometimes
to remind myself of the good times we spent together.
Of course.

column3: 朕有数月不曾去看过皇后了
column6: I haven't visited you for months.
I am old and my looks have faded.

I can't compare to the young concubines
who are healthy and able to conceive children.

column3: 多去年轻的妃嫔那儿走走
column6: Your Majesty should visit young concubines more when you have time,

column3: 别总把自己关在养心殿

column6:
instead of locking yourself all day
in the Hall of Mental Cultivation.

I was in the middle of sorting my sister's
belongings before I headed here this morning.

column3: 才整理了一半便放在那里
趁天色还早臣妾先行告退
column6: I'll take my leave while it's still well lit.
Certainly.

Translators: The Magpie Bridge Brigade 鹊桥小队翻译组
https://magpiebridgebrigade.cn
Twitter/FB/IG @BrigadeMagpie 公众号/微博: 鹊桥小队翻译组

column3:
Theme: The Lonely Phoenix
[phoenix is the symbol of an empress]
column6:
Theme: The Phoenix Taking Flight
[phoenix is the symbol of an empress]

column3:
I dimly recall the colorful blooms in every summer.
They are as distant as the autumn moon in the water.
column6:
The dreams I dimly recall;
The past I hardly remember,
amidst the autumn moons and the spring flowers.
Like the moon's reflection on water
or flowers seen through mist - floating and drifting.

column3:
He loved me with a volatile heart.
And before I knew it, we fell apart.

Behind me are the promises and longing.
Before me lie the flute and the zither.

I loved you with my body and soul
But you hurt me from head to toe.

My wish ran athwart
and I ended up a fool of my destiny.
column6:
My wish ran against my will.
Behold the mockery of destiny and the game of fate.

column3: My love was the wind-swept flowers from a tree.
column6:
My unwavering love is gone
like flowers swept away in the wind.

column3:
A plum bloomed in winter hoping for a fruitful summer.
But the irresistible winds of destiny destroyed her wish.

You can hear the flapping of a phoenix
but you will never see it.
column6:
A phoenix about to take flight rustles its wings
but the arc of its flight is unseen.

column3: What you see is the falling leaves from the phoenix tree.
column6:
The phoenix tree sways in the wind,
shedding memories in the whispers of the falling leaves.

column3: The falling leaves from the phoenix tree.
column6:
The phoenix tree sways in the wind,
shedding memories in the whispers of the falling leaves.
